concept.title: GCCONCENTRIC Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates a concentric geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create a concentric constraint to ensure two circular or elliptical entities remain concentric.

section.title: Method to create a concentric constraint
section.p:
There is one method to begin creating a concentric constraint:
Select first entity

dlentry.dd: Begin creating a concentric constraint by selecting a circular or elliptical entity then:
Select a circular or elliptical entity to make concentric with the first entity. The first entity maintains its position while the second entity moves, as necessary, to become concentric.
